legal.privacy_intro: At LegalFlow we take your data protection very seriously. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
legal.cookies_intro: This policy explains how we use cookies and similar technologies on legalflow.digital.
legal.legal_intro: This notice regulates the general conditions of use of the portal legalflow.digital.

privacy_content.title: 1. Data Controller
privacy_content.body: LegalFlow Technologies, S.L. (hereinafter, "LegalFlow") with registered office in Madrid, Spain. Contact email: privacy@legalflow.digital.

privacy_content.title: 2. Data We Collect
privacy_content.body: We collect data you provide when registering (name, email, organization), documents you upload for AI analysis, usage and navigation data, and billing information securely processed by Stripe.

privacy_content.title: 3. Purpose of Processing
privacy_content.body: Your data is used for: providing legal assistance service with AI, managing your account and subscription, improving the service through aggregated and anonymous analysis, service-related communications, and compliance with legal obligations.

privacy_content.title: 4. Legal Basis
privacy_content.body: Processing is based on: contract execution (Art. 6.1.b GDPR), your explicit consent for document processing (Art. 6.1.a GDPR), legitimate interest for service improvement (Art. 6.1.f GDPR), and compliance with legal obligations (Art. 6.1.c GDPR).

privacy_content.title: 5. Iron Siloâ„¢ Technology
privacy_content.body: All documents are processed with our Iron Siloâ„¢ end-to-end encryption technology. Data is stored on servers located in the EU, complying with GDPR. We do not share documents with third parties and the AI processes data in real-time without persistent storage of the analyzed content.

privacy_content.title: 6. Data Retention
privacy_content.body: Your personal data is kept while you maintain your active account. Uploaded documents can be deleted by you at any time. Upon account cancellation, data is deleted within a maximum period of 30 days, except for legal retention obligations.

privacy_content.title: 7. User Rights
privacy_content.body: You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, erasure, portability, restriction, and objection by contacting privacy@legalflow.digital. You also have the right to file a claim with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD).

privacy_content.title: 8. International Transfers
privacy_content.body: We do not perform data transfers outside the European Economic Area. All servers and processing services are located in the EU.

cookies_content.title: 1. What are Cookies?
cookies_content.body: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us improve your experience and understand how you use the service.

cookies_content.title: 2. Technical Cookies (Necessary)
cookies_content.body: These cookies are essential for the platform's operation: authentication session (keeps you logged in), language preferences (remembers your selected language), and CSRF token (security protection against attacks). They cannot be deactivated.

cookies_content.title: 3. Affiliate Cookies
cookies_content.body: If you arrive at LegalFlow through an affiliate link, we store a reference cookie (referral_code) for 30 days to correctly attribute the recommendation. This cookie only contains the affiliate code.

cookies_content.title: 4. Analytical Cookies
cookies_content.body: We use our own analytical cookies to understand aggregated usage patterns. We do not use Google Analytics or third-party services that track your activity on other sites. Data is completely anonymous.

cookies_content.title: 5. Third-Party Cookies
cookies_content.body: Stripe (payment processor): uses strictly necessary cookies to process payments securely. These cookies are subject to Stripe's privacy policy. We do not use advertising or social media cookies.

cookies_content.title: 6. Cookie Management
cookies_content.body: You can configure your browser to block or delete cookies at any time. Note that deactivating technical cookies may affect the platform's operation. For more information, consult your browser's help.

cookies_content.title: 7. Updates
cookies_content.body: This policy may be updated periodically. The date of the last update is shown at the end of the document. We will notify you of significant changes by email.

legal_content.title: 1. General Information
legal_content.body: In compliance with the information duty gathered in article 10 of Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Information Society Services and Electronic Commerce, the data of the website owner are detailed.

legal_content.title: 2. Website Owner
legal_content.body: The website legalflow.digital is owned by LegalFlow Technologies, S.L., with NIF B12345678 and registered office in Madrid, Spain. Company registered in the Mercantile Registry of Madrid.

legal_content.title: 3. Intellectual Property
legal_content.body: All website contents, including texts, graphics, logos, and images, are property of LegalFlow Technologies, S.L. or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.

legal_content.title: 4. Conditions of Use
legal_content.body: The user agrees to make appropriate use of the contents and services of the platform, avoiding illicit activities or those contrary to good faith and public order.

legal_content.title: 5. Disclaimer
legal_content.body: LegalFlow is not responsible for damages that may derive from the use of information contained on the website, nor from service interruption or the presence of viruses.

legal_content.title: 6. Applicable Legislation
legal_content.body: These conditions are governed by Spanish legislation. For any controversy, the parties submit to the courts and tribunals of the city of Madrid.

features.title: Why LegalFlow?
features.subtitle: Designed for HR Departments and Consultancies.
features.security_desc: Cryptographically isolated data. Your organization is an impenetrable fortress.
features.ai_desc: Our AI doesn't just read laws, it *understands* your internal contracts. Upload PDFs, images, or employee guides.
features.global_desc: Adapted for employees in Spain, Morocco, and LATAM.
features.security_expanded: We use military-grade AES-256 encryption for all documents and personal data. Furthermore, our Iron Siloâ„¢ architecture ensures total data isolation per firm, guaranteeing that only authorized personnel can access confidential information.
features.ai_expanded: The STARK 2.0 Engine is capable of analyzing complex official documents in seconds. It allows for intelligent data extraction for direct export to immigration forms (EX-01, EX-11, etc.), reducing manual management time by 80%.
features.global_expanded: We offer full support for a wide range of procedures, including Social Rooting (Arraigo Social), Digital Nomad Visa, Residency by Investment (Golden Visa), and family reunification. Our coverage extends across the major migration corridors to Spain.

affiliate_terms.title: Affiliate Program Terms
affiliate_terms.last_update: Last update: February 2026 â€¢ LegalFlow Pro

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: The LegalFlow Affiliate Program is open to legal professionals, administrative managers, relocation agencies, immigration consultancies, and content creators who comply with current Spanish regulations.
eligibility.sub: To participate, the applicant must be of legal age and have the legal capacity to enter into contracts. LegalFlow reserves the right to accept or reject affiliate applications at its discretion.

commissions.title: Commission Structure
commissions.content: A <1>20% recurring commission</1> (monthly or yearly) will be granted for each new subscriber who signs up for a paid plan through the affiliate's personalized link.
commissions.example: <1>Example:</1> If you refer a subscriber to the Business Plan (149â‚¬/month), you will receive <1>29.80â‚¬/month</1> on a recurring basis as long as the subscriber keeps their plan active.

cookies.title: Attribution and Cookies
cookies.content: We use a <1>30-day</1> attribution window. If a potential customer clicks on your affiliate link and completes the subscription within that period, the commission will be automatically assigned to you.
cookies.sub: The tracking cookie is stored in the visitor's browser for a duration of 30 calendar days. If the visitor clicks on another affiliate's link, the most recent attribution (last-click attribution) will prevail.

payments.title: Payments and Settlement
payments.content: Commissions will be settled <1>monthly</1> via Stripe or bank transfer, once a minimum threshold of <1>50â‚¬</1> is reached.
details: Commissions are calculated on the net amount (excluding VAT) of the subscription.
The affiliate is responsible for complying with their tax obligations.
Pending payments below the threshold accumulate for the next period.

ethics.title: Ethics, Conduct, and Spam
ethics.content: The use of spam techniques, misleading advertising, identity theft, or any practice that could damage LegalFlow's reputation is <1>strictly prohibited</1>.
ethics.warning: <1>âš ï¸ Important:</1> Failure to comply with this rule will result in the <1>immediate termination</1> from the program and the loss of all accumulated and pending commissions.

modifications.title: Modifications and Validity
modifications.content: LegalFlow reserves the right to modify these terms at any time, notifying the affiliate in advance by email with a minimum of 15 days notice.
modifications.sub: Continued participation in the program following the notification of changes will be understood as acceptance of the new terms. The affiliate may leave the program at any time without penalty.

affiliate_terms.footer:
Â© 2026 LegalFlow Pro. All rights reserved.
These terms are subject to Spanish legislation and the jurisdiction of the courts of Madrid.

register_affiliate.title: Join the Partner Program
register_affiliate.desc: Earn a <1>20% recurring commission</1> for each firm or agency that subscribes with your link.
register_affiliate.success_desc: We will review your application within the next <1>24-48 hours</1>. You will receive an email with your affiliate link and access to the tracking panel.
